job_to_be_done.task: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title:  Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
 Instructions:
o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter. o Serve with breadsticks.

 Instructions:
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Blanch green beans until tender. o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate. o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad. o Toss gently and serve.

Instructions:
• In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. • Season with salt and pepper. • Serve immediately.

 Instructions:
o Prepare each side dish separately. o Arrange on small plates. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

Breakfast Tacos Ingredients:
• 2 large eggs • 1/4 cup shredded cheese • 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon • 1/4 cup diced bell pepper • 1/4 cup diced onions • 2 small flour tortillas • Salsa for serving
